ygData.subject: Re: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It works much better at higher levels.  In the low 30s, if I don t attack, sometimes my tank friends can pull a mob I ve charmed off me in just one hit.
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 3 Sep 1999, Elijah Meeker wrote:
>
> Heh, there is a level difference skewing this discussion. No, warriors can't
> taunt anything, at level 17 a warrior with maxed taunt couldn't get anything
> off me. I haven't grouped with another of my same level since. Maybe at
> higher levels it works better.

It works much better at higher levels. In the low 30s, if I
don't attack, sometimes my tank friends can pull a mob I've
charmed off me in just one hit. Not only does their taunt get
better, their damage increases which really helps the mobs
forget about you.

I still end up taking the brunt of the hits if I'm using
Lullaby though.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
